Hi Katja ---

Here's the hack I use.  Pass the viewpoint as arguments to the .cal
function.  Then view direction is just:

Vx = -(arg(1) - Px);
Vy = -(arg(2) - Py);
Vz = -(arg(3) - Pz);

where Px, Py and Pz are the Radiance predefined variable names for the
ray intersection points.

Hope this helps,
Roland
